product_name: The North Face Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face women's Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket gives you two classics in one: a waterproof, breathable HyVent(R) rain shell and a removable stretch-fleece liner for 3-way versatility. Seam-sealed, waterproof, windproof shell can be worn alone on mild, rainy days, or with the fleece liner jacket on colder, wet days. Liner jacket is made of TKA Superstretch hardface fleece and is designed to be worn alone as well as under the shell. Shell provides a fully adjustable hood, brushed chin guard, elastic cuffs, adjustable hem and zippered hand pockets. Liner jacket features hand pockets and self-fabric stretch cuffs. The North Face Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket for women is zip-in compatible with complementing garments from The North Face.
short_description: The North Face women's Momentum Triclimate 3-in-1 jacket gives you two classics in one: a waterproof, breathable HyVent(R) rain shell and a removable stretch-fleece liner for 3-way versatility.
